name: #65 The King of Light
description:
The Prince of Light suddenly felt a surge of energy so strong running through his body and noticed another sword forming. After the energy surge stopped, two swords floated behind the Prince of Light, and the King stood there smiling, saying to all creatures standing at the battlefield,

“My Child, is now glory embodied. Army! Brace, for there will be no folly, and the Prince of Light is now King, of Golemia!”

All Hail, The King of Light.

[Season 1, Chapter 8 - The King of Golemia](https://eyeverse.world/chapter-8)
